title: Male actor needed for live event (2 hours) in Orlando, FL
snippet:
We’re looking for an actor to appear at a technology-related tradeshow in Orlando, FL on Wed, Nov 9. The gig will run from 6:30 pm to approximately 8:30 pm. We’re looking for a male between 25 and 50 years of age. 

You will come to the event pretending to be a conference attendee (we will register a badge for you). You will walk around the trade show floor for about 30 minutes wearing a golf shirt, a pair of boxers, socks and shoes — but no pants. You will pretend that nothing is wrong and carry on as though you’re there to collect information for your business.

You will not be expected to talk to any vendors. You will be given guidance on how to respond if other attendees approach you. You will have your picture taken and the photos will be shared on social media.

After the first 30 minutes, you will go to our company’s tradeshow booth for more photos. And that’s it. It’s a very easy gig. We will pay for 2 hours but it likely won’t take the full time.

The key will be walking around in your boxers like it’s the most natural thing in the world. :)

Any questions, just ask.
